summary:
About us - Welcome to the world of Watermelon, an innovative service that brings together the best neural networks that can fulfill your every request, whether it's a simple chat, or working with video/photo, or maybe even building websites and applications

 Features - That's why we're better than our competitors

Confidentiality of information

We promise the security, safety and confidentiality of your information

Speed of operation

The current speed is 1,000 requests per minute. In the future we plan to speed up to 10,000 requests per minute

Work with any requests

Work with any request - photo, video, chat, etc. (even 18+)

 Roadmap - This is the initial roadmap for the project and things can change at any time (for the better)
